thread.section_title: Rover.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rover.com | rover.com | 2 of 140
thread.title: Lucey

author: Lucey
title: Lucey
text: I found Rover.com randomly while searching Craigslist for a dogwalker. They have a great system that makes it easy to find, meet, and pay a dogwalker. I like that I can go on Rover to schedule and pay for future dogwalks so easily. My dogwalker has been reliable and trustworthy. She is able to track her walk, and post photos and other info about the walk, that gets sent to my email and Rover account. Overall, I've had a great experience!
